entry: Groove Launchy iz a metro-styley launchar fur cutomizzy and sleeky experincez! U can play wiff tile sizez, shufflez tile posishuns, changey colur themz, and pick fav wallpapurrs!
list_featuers_0: Metro-Style Look: Cleany & smoooothie designy, like Windowz Fone 8!
list_featuers_1: Tile Play: Draggy drop tilez, biggy small sizez, and move dem 2 ur style!
list_featuers_2: Theme Changer: Changey colurz 2 match ur meowd or vibes!
list_featuers_3: Wallpapurrz Galore: Picky set ur own wallpapurr 4 purrfect style!
paragraph_contributing_0: We likey ur halp! Plz send issuez n pull req 2 improve Groove Launchy.
list_paragraph_contributing_1: Make new branch fur ur featur or fixiez.
list_paragraph_contributing_2: Pull req wen code iz ready yay!

paragraph_contact_0: Got thinkiez or feedbackz? Meow us, we wanna hear!
